message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a fantastic deal for you, as it's worth $15,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. It's a good product, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $12,500 is just a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  This still gives you a good deal, and it's closer to my minimum price. Let's work together to make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $13,500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $13,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me there?
